title: Welcoming Remarks by Chair Janet L. Yellen
content: For release on delivery  9:30 a.m. EST   November 12, 2015        Welcoming Remarks         by     Janet L. Yellen     Chair     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     “Monetary Policy Implementation and Transmission in the Post-Crisis Period,”   a research conference sponsored by    the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     Washington, D.C.                 November 12, 2015
